_comment: Monday.com Item Duplicator - Workflow Configuration Template
_description: This template shows how to configure workflows. Copy to workflows.json and customize.

standard_seo.description: Standard SEO workflow - core content elements for all clients

custom_template_example.description: Custom template for specific use cases

overrides._comment: Override specific column mappings from template

additional_mappings._comment: Add extra columns not in template
additional_mappings.name: Extra Field

_notes: 1. Column Types: text, link, board_relation, dropdown, color, status
2. Overrides replace template mappings for specific columns
3. Additional mappings add new columns not in the template
4. Multi-destination workflows copy one item to multiple boards
5. Set enabled: false to temporarily disable a workflow
6. Use templates to reuse common column mappings across workflows
